name: Jewel World, Inc.
description: Jewel World, Inc. is a leading retailer in the luxury jewelry market, specializing in ethically sourced gemstones and handcrafted jewelry. Founded in 2010, the company has established a reputation for quality and innovation in design, offering a wide range of products that cater to discerning customers. Jewel World is committed to sustainability, ensuring that all materials used in their jewelry are conflict-free and sourced from responsible suppliers. The company operates both online and through several flagship stores in major cities, allowing customers to experience the beauty and craftsmanship of its collections firsthand. Jewel World's product line includes engagement rings, necklaces, bracelets, and earrings, all designed to celebrate life’s special moments. The company prides itself on its exceptional customer service and personalized shopping experiences, utilizing advanced technology to provide virtual consultations and custom designs. With a strong focus on community engagement, Jewel World supports local artisans and participates in initiatives that promote environmental stewardship. As a forward-thinking company, Jewel World is also exploring innovative technologies such as augmented reality to enhance the customer experience and streamline the purchasing process. Through its dedication to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, Jewel World, Inc. continues to set new standards in the luxury jewelry industry.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Jewel World, Inc. | Luxury Jewelry and Ethical Gemstones
seo.meta_description: Explore Jewel World, Inc., a leader in luxury jewelry retail. Discover our ethically sourced gemstones and handcrafted designs that celebrate life's moments.

faq.question: What types of jewelry does Jewel World offer?
faq.answer: Jewel World offers a range of fine jewelry including engagement rings, necklaces, bracelets, and earrings.

faq.question: Where is Jewel World headquartered?
faq.answer: Jewel World is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What is Jewel World's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Jewel World is committed to using ethically sourced and conflict-free materials in all of its jewelry.
